dialog.speaker: narrator
dialog.text: You wake up in your new apartment in Japan. The morning sunlight streams through the blinds.

dialog.speaker: alex
dialog.japanese: おはよう！起きたんだね！

dialog.speaker: player
dialog.text: Good morning. You must be Alex?
dialog.japanese: おはようございます。アレックスさんですか？

dialog.speaker: alex
dialog.text: That's right! Welcome to Japan! I'm Alex Thompson, your roommate for the month.
dialog.japanese: そうだよ！日本へようこそ！アレックス・トンプソンだよ。１ヶ月間のルームメイトになる。

dialog.speaker: player
dialog.text: Thanks for having me. I'm excited to be here.
dialog.japanese: よろしくお願いします。楽しみにしています。

dialog.speaker: alex
dialog.text: I made some coffee. Would you like some before we head out? Your language school orientation starts at 10:00.
dialog.japanese: コーヒーを入れたよ。出かける前に飲む？君の語学学校のオリエンテーションは10時からだよ。

dialog.speaker: player
dialog.japanese: コーヒーいいですね、ありがとう！

dialog.speaker: alex
dialog.text: It's about 8:30 now. The school is a 15-minute walk from here. I'll show you the way today.
dialog.japanese: 今8時30分ごろだよ。学校はここから歩いて15分だよ。今日は道を案内するね。

vocabulary.word: よろしくお願いします
vocabulary.translation: Nice to meet you/Please treat me well
